title: 3,500 MT of gas to reach SL today (4) : Litro
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro said that a vessel carrying 3,500 of gas is scheduled to arrive in the country on Monday (4).
The Chairman of Litro, Thesara Jayasinghe said that raids would continue to locate vendors who are selling gas at exorbitant prices.
